messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] The Barrage
messages.msgSnippet: Fromt he bottom of http://www.relaypoint.net/~patriot/homschl.htm The Unschooling Information Barrage The Unschooling Information Barrage is a set of 23 pieces
messages.messageBody:
Fromt he bottom of http://www.relaypoint.net/~patriot/homschl.htm

The Unschooling Information Barrage

The Unschooling Information Barrage is a set of 23 pieces of e-mail that
consists primarily of unschooling chat logs, articles, and resources
available to anyone seeking knowledge about the unschooling philosophy and
method of homeschooling.

To request this free information, please e-mail Monica Molinar at:
AkMomOf3@...

-----Original Message-----
From: strandbe@... [mailto:strandbe@...]
Sent: Sunday, June 04, 2000 9:04 AM
To: unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] The Barrage


Do any of you "oldies" remember who used to send out "The Barrage" (lots of
great unschooling information)? I'd like to give it to a friend of mine, but
it's "locked up" in my old aol stuff and I can't access it. Every time I try
to use anything connected with aol my computer completely gums up. (My
e-mail address says aol 'cause I use the aol website for now.)

Thanks.

Susan

Yeah I got it around here somewhere too, let me see if I can find it. In the
meantime go to unschooling.com and read their essays!
ps. don't remember who sent them, but when I pull them up it will show the
original sender.
Kathy
